Name: The Village of Barovia
Description: Tall shapes loom out of the dense fog that surrounds everything. The muddy ground underfoot gives way to slick, wet cobblestones. The tall shapes become recognizable as the dwellings of the village of Barovia. The windows of each house stare out from pools of black nothingness. No sound cuts the silence except for a single mournful sobbing mat echoes through the streets from a distance.

ContextActions.Action: Visit the 'Blood of the Vine' Tavern
Search for the source of the sobbing
Leave The Village via the East Road
Leave The Village via the West Road
